title: Imperial War Museums - D-Day Collection
description: Comprehensive collection of D-Day artifacts, photographs, and first-hand accounts from the Imperial War Museums.

title: Mémorial de Caen
description: Major museum and memorial dedicated to the history of WWII and the Battle of Normandy, located in Caen, France.

title: National Archives - D-Day Records
description: Official U.S. government records, photographs, and documents related to Operation Overlord.

title: Commonwealth War Graves Commission
description: Records and information about Commonwealth casualties and cemeteries in Normandy.

title: D-Day: The Battle for Normandy
author: Antony Beevor
description: Acclaimed comprehensive history of the Normandy invasion and subsequent campaign, drawing on extensive archival research.

title: D-Day: June 6, 1944
author: Stephen E. Ambrose
description: Detailed account of the invasion focusing on the experiences of soldiers at all levels.

title: Six Armies in Normandy
author: John Keegan
description: Classic analysis of the Normandy campaign examining the experience of six different national forces.

title: Overlord: D-Day and the Battle for Normandy
author: Max Hastings
description: Comprehensive military history of the Normandy campaign with analysis of Allied and German operations.

title: The Longest Day
author: Cornelius Ryan
description: Landmark narrative history of D-Day based on interviews with over 1,000 participants from all sides.

title: D-Day Overlord
description: Comprehensive online resource dedicated to the history of D-Day and the Battle of Normandy.

title: U.S. Army Center of Military History - Normandy
description: Official U.S. Army historical publications on the Normandy Campaign.

title: BBC History - World War Two
description: Educational content and documentaries about World War II from the BBC.

title: Dwight D. Eisenhower Presidential Library
description: Primary source documents from Eisenhower's papers related to SHAEF and D-Day planning.

title: Pegasus Bridge Memorial Museum
description: Museum dedicated to the British airborne operations on D-Day, located at the original Pegasus Bridge.

title: Utah Beach D-Day Museum
description: Museum on Utah Beach chronicling the American landings and liberation of the Cotentin Peninsula.

title: Juno Beach Centre
description: Canadian museum on Juno Beach dedicated to Canada's role in WWII and D-Day.

title: The D-Day Story Portsmouth
description: Museum in Portsmouth, UK, telling the story of D-Day from embarkation to the Battle of Normandy.

title: Musée de la Résistance et de la Déportation
description: Network of French museums documenting the Resistance movement and civilian experience during occupation.

title: Wikimedia Commons - D-Day Collection
description: Public domain photographs and documents related to the Normandy landings.

title: Library of Congress - D-Day Collection
description: Photographs, maps, and documents from the Library of Congress collections.
